com.weebly.opus1269.clipman.model

Class Devices

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.weebly.opus1269.clipman.model.Devices

  • public class Devices
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton to manage the collection of registered Device objects. Register a LocalBroadcastManager with Intents.FILTER_DEVICES to be notified of changes.
